|brand = AirTight Networks |model = SS-300-AT |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -C-55 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/20/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AirTight_Networks_C-55 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = U2M-CAP4200AG |icid = 3616C-CAP4200AG |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0507001 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 560<!-- 560 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;FL256SAIFR0; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:74 |oui = 00:11:74
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = PoE in |addchip = 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier w/Power Detector;SiGe;SE2537L;;2;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 2.4GHz High-Gain Power Amplifier;Silicon Storage Technology;SST12LP15A;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = CAP4200AG |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 10/31/2021 |fccapprovdate = 11/28/2012 |estreldate = 11/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9382; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Rebranded at some point as Mojo C-55
"7016A0507001 Ver: 1.00" is silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9344 [[MIPS 74K]] (@533MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9344 (802.11an) :[[Atheros]] AR9382 (802.11bgn) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V, 1.25A via barrel or 802.3af/at PoE
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/airtight/airtight_c-55 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here

==See also== *[[AirTight Networks C-55]] • 802.11abgn 2T2R <!-- [[AzureWave AW-NR580]] ? -->• [https://www.securewifiworks.com/C-55.asp PPage] *[[AirTight Networks C-60]] • 802.11abgn 3T3R • [https://www.securewifiworks.com/C-60.asp PPage] :SoC: [[Atheros]] AR9344 rev 2 @560MHz ? :RAM: 128MB; Flash: [[STMicro]] NAND (32MB) ::''Macronix'' MX25L3205D SPI NOR (4MB) :WLAN1: [[Atheros]] AR9344 rev 2 (WiSoC) :WLAN2: [[Atheros]] AR9390 rev 4 (PCIe) :Switch: [[Atheros]] AR8327N (x2 ports) *[[AirTight Networks C-65]] • 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R • [https://www.securewifiworks.com/C-65.asp PPage] *[[AirTight Networks C-75]] • [[Lite-On WM863]] • [https://www.securewifiworks.com/C-75.asp PPage]
